snippet: Canada’s postal service said Wednesday that it would cease home delivery over the next five years, and substantially increase postal rates.
abstract: Canada’s postal service says that it will cease home delivery over the next five years, and substantially increase postal rates.
lead_paragraph: Canada’s postal service said Wednesday that it would cease home delivery over the next five years, and substantially increase postal rates.

headline.main: Canada to Stop Delivering Mail to City Homes Over 5 Years
headline.print_headline: Canada to Stop Delivering Mail To City Homes Over 5 Years
